Binary Classification Measures

auc()

Area Under the ROC Curve

bbrier()

Binary Brier Score

dor()

Diagnostic Odds Ratio

fbeta()

F-beta Score

fdr()

False Discovery Rate

fn()

False Negatives

fnr()

False Negative Rate

fomr()

False Omission Rate

fp()

False Positives

fpr()

False Positive Rate

mcc()

Matthews Correlation Coefficient

npv()

Negative Predictive Value

ppv() precision()

Positive Predictive Value

prauc()

Area Under the Precision-Recall Curve

tn()

True Negatives

tnr() specificity()

True Negative Rate

tp()

True Positives

tpr() recall() sensitivity()

True Positive Rate

R Squared

sae()
